about_the_game:
Goldilock One: The Mists of Jakaira is an action RPG that transports the player to a prison on the darkest and coldest side of a distant planet. Survive massive battles, form alliances, and find answers to your exile in this hostile and unforgiving environment.

Explore and Face the Dangers of Nebegarde

The inhospitable open-air prison on the icy side of a distant planet, where the worst criminals are sent with their memories erased. Venture forth and immerse yourself in a dense plot filled with dilemmas and choices that will reveal the different faces of a reality previously unknown as you seek to understand the reason for your own exile.

Master Combat

With combat requiring strategy and skill, Goldilock One offers a unique blend of hack 'n' slash against multiple enemies and more paced moments with challenging foes that will demand more self-preservation.

Form Alliances

Develop relationships with various NPCs; depending on your decisions, some may join your adventure as companions. Switch control between them in real-time, accessing unique challenges and previously inaccessible areas.

Face Unique Enemies

Challenge creatures ranging from native beings of a new planet to genetically modified creatures and even futuristic machines. Encounter creations inspired by mythological elements from various cultures and Brazilian folklore.

Venture Solo or in Cooperation

Take on this challenge alone or enjoy party moments by inviting a friend to join in split-screen with local or online multiplayer (via Remote Play Together).

Open World and Exploration: Nebegarde is a vast territory full of dangers and mysteries. Explore varied environments, discover secrets, and forge alliances with NPCs to increase your chances of survival.

Party System and Cooperation: Control different members of your group, each with unique abilities that can be combined to overcome challenges and solve complex puzzles.

Unique Graphics and Design: A visual style that mixes realistic elements with cel-shaded stylized art, evoking the aesthetic of graphic novels and comic books.

Dynamic Narrative and Dilemma System: Your decisions shape the world around you. The game's dilemma system offers multiple ways to complete quests and solve puzzles, with outcomes that deeply affect the story's progression.

content_descriptors.notes:
Gameplay consists of frequent combat scenarios with characters using their weapon to slash enemies. Some larger enemies are opened up to intense finishing moves showing enemies being ripped apart, dismembered, or decapitated.

Strong Language is used in the dialogue.
